item.title: Lingar Ajendra debate
item.description:
This is not pramana

There was debate between lingarajendra swami and vijayeendra teertharu on the paratattvam of Mahadeva

Lingarajendra, told that Shiva is sarvottama quoting “EkO rudrO na dvitIyOvatasthE shiva Eva kEvalaM”. He also quoted a story from one of the tamasa purana, wherein Shiva got bruhat lingaakara, and Brahma in hamsa roopa – Vishnu in Varaha roopa both failed to find the top and bottom of the linga and surrendered before Shiva Then Vijayeendra Tirtharu quoted the story is from taamasa purana and is not to be taken as pramana, as Sri Vedavyasa has quoted that quotes from tamasa purana are only for asura jana mohanaartha.
